scenario_text.value:
Professor, last time we came here you said
you hadn’t finished investigating, but...

No, I’m afraid I wasn’t able to make any new
discoveries concerning these murals.

As I said before, it seems some immense power
brought tragedy to a great many.

Though I can’t get any more than that from
this mural.

Wasn’t it...humans and Kemonogami suffering?
No, something about four god-like beings...

Yes, the four god-like beings from ancient
legends. This mural includes aspects of them.

And the composition still bothers me. Heaven
is traditionally above and hell below.

No, I’m afraid I can’t offer any
interpretation of this mural.

Hmm... If only I knew how this connected to
the other murals, I might understand it.
